column2: 0.8 for findings which could benefit from quantification; 0.7 for summary at the bottom or sprinkled around and/or presence of factual findings, and/or sparse findings and/or findings needing quantification
column3: 0.8 for minor repeatability concerns; else 0.6 for gap between factual findings and query results; else 0.4 for major repeatability concerns
column4: 1 for demonstrations of inner join and outer join; else 0.8 for improper join syntax or conditions; else 0.7 for multiple instances of improper syntax or conditions; else 0.5 for either; else 0.4 for both joins but each with improper syntax; else 0.3 for lacking one type of join and the other having improper syntax
